# Making this book

-   New Project, New Directory, Quarto book

-   edit `_quarto.yml`

To add GitHub Actions:

-   add `DESCRIPTION`

-   add `_book/` to `.gitignore`

-   add GitHub Actions workflow

-   Settings, Actions -- give GA write access
